hero.title: 360 Scan Technology
hero.subtitle: Discover a new era of preventive healthcare with our advanced scanning system.

hero.title: Revolutionizing Health Technology
hero.subtitle: Empowering individuals with cutting-edge scanning solutions for preventive healthcare.

logoGrid.title: Trusted by leading clinics and partners

sections.title: Vroege opsporing, gemoedsrust
sections.text: Onze technologie helpt je bij het vroegtijdig opsporen van gezondheidsrisico's zodat je gemoedsrust hebt.

sections.title: Voor jou
sections.text: Persoonlijke inzichten en scanresultaten op maat van jouw lichaam en gezondheid.

sections.title: Onze locaties
sections.text: Bezoek een van onze scanpunten verspreid door het land voor jouw 360 scan ervaring.

items.quote: The 360 Scan has completely changed how we approach preventive care.
items.author: Dr. Sarah Johnson

items.quote: Fast, reliable, and non-invasive. Our patients love it.
items.author: Dr. Mark Evans

cta.title: Join the future of preventive healthcare today

data.title: Verify your account
data.subtitle: We have send a verification email. Please verify your account by clicking on the link in the email.

okResend.title: Email sent!
okResend.text: Please check your inbox and click the verification link.

data.title: Create new password
data.subtitle: Enter your new password below or generate one.

data.title: Forgot your password?
data.subtitle: Enter your details to receive a reset link.

data.title: Email confirmation
data.subtitle: We sent a verification code to your email. Enter the code from the email in the field below.

errors.min: Password must be at least 6 characters long
errors.matches: Use at least a number, an uppercase, a lowercase and a special char (@$!%*#?&_)
